nodes.title: Athens Downtown
nodes.excerpt: Our Athens downtown station is located at 49, Syggrou Avenue. We are open and waiting for you from 08:30am to 21:00pm all year round. You can find our station on Google maps by clicking here.

nodes.title: Athens Airport
nodes.excerpt: Our Athens airport station is located right next to the airport. One of our representatives is waiting for you at the arrivals hall and escorts you to our shuttle bus. From there you are transported to our station. On your way back, our shuttle bus will again move you to the departure halls. We are […]
